name: PUZZLE: BIRDS
description:
PUZZLE: BIRDS - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and get a picture of different birds.

You need to collect from the small pictures one big and after you may to going at the new leavlFeatures:
  • Simple controls (mouse)
  • Relaxing soundtrack.
  • Beautiful pictures of birds.
  • Gameplay for children and adults.
Credits:
  • Programming: Artur Bikmullin (AFBIK Studio)
  • Music and effects: zapsplat
  • Pictures: Internet
